details.message: OpenCV reported the frame count to be 5098, but FFmpeg reported it to be 5044. 5044 will be used.

pipeline.name: DYNAMIC SPEECH AZURE ONLY WITH TRANSLATION PIPELINE
pipeline.description: Runs VISTA speaker detection on audio or video, and passes to Azure for transcription. Then translates transcript to English. Keyword tagging is performed on all TRANSCRIPT and TRANSLATION results.

tasks.name: VISTA SPEAKER DETECTION (AZURE ONLY) TASK
tasks.description: Runs VISTA on audio or video to detect the speaker language, and passes all speakers to Azure for speech-to-text.

actions.name: VISTA SPEAKER DETECTION (AZURE ONLY) ACTION
actions.description: Runs VISTA on audio or video to detect the speaker language, and passes all speakers to Azure for speech-to-text.

tasks.name: AZURE SPEECH DETECTION WITH UPSTREAM SPEAKER TASK
tasks.description: Runs speech-to-text with Azure Cognitive Services on audio or video using language provided in feed-forward track.

actions.name: AZURE SPEECH DETECTION WITH UPSTREAM SPEAKER ACTION
actions.description: Runs speech-to-text with Azure Cognitive Services on audio or video using language provided in feed-forward track.

tasks.name: AZURE TRANSLATION (WITH FF REGION) TASK
tasks.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform translation on feed-forward tracks and detections.

actions.name: AZURE TRANSLATION (WITH FF REGION) ACTION
actions.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform translation on feed-forward tracks and detections.

tasks.name: CUSTOM KEYWORD TAGGING (WITH FF REGION) TASK
tasks.description: Performs text keyword tagging on feed-forward tracks and detections.

actions.name: CUSTOM KEYWORD TAGGING (WITH FF REGION) ACTION
actions.description: Performs text keyword tagging on feed-forward tracks and detections.
